TopicTitle: Search your username using the forum search bar

Articles.Content:
it's funny seeing what others say about you.

 

Most of what you will find is older posts of yours or people replying to you, but you will occasionally see one that you never knew about, posted by someone else.

Edited March 20, 2016 by Clockwork13
..It's times like these when I wish I just added digits to my username.
If you click on "All content" after you click on the search bar, and look at the bottom, theirs a "Members" tab so you can specifically look for members
